title: Emeline-A Journey
description: I canâ€™t ask Pa; I must decide for myself. What do I really want?Set in 1890, a period of no phones or refrigerators, thirteen-year old Emeline has lost both parents and must travel through ten states all by herself to reconnect with her family in Boston.On the way, she encounters many people and trials. Some characters are unsavory, ruthless, and violent, wanting only her money and possessions, caring nothing for her life. But, all is not bleak: good folks make her trip memorable, giving her help as they are able. Will she make it, and, if she does, will she stay? Will the events of her journey redefine her life? This Christian historical fiction adventure will educate, entertain, and inspire young readers.
author: Kathy J. Perry
